ans: Global Shapers from around the world have come together to raise funds for Anera, an NGO that is actively providing humanitarian aid to the people of Palestine. Anera is addressing urgent needs in Gaza, the West Bank, and East Jerusalem.

ques: WHY IS THIS FUNDRAISING INITIATIVE IMPORTANT?
ans: The people in Palestine are facing a severe humanitarian crisis. Your support can provide immediate relief to those in need. Together, we can make a significant impact and help alleviate their suffering.

ques: WHY HAVE SHAPERS CHOSEN TO COLLABORATE WITH ANERA?
ans: We have chosen to collaborate with Anera (anera.org) because they have a long-standing reputation for their effective humanitarian work in the region. Anera's local expertise and commitment to the well-being of Palestinians make them a trusted partner. They were the first to respond to the crisis, and we believe in their ability to efficiently deliver aid where it is needed most

ques: HOW CAN I MAKE A DONATION?
ans: Donating is easy and secure. You can donate directly through our fundraising page on Anera's website. Simply click on the provided link, and you'll be guided through the process.
